pages.text: order for pick-up! Healthy & Fresh View Our Menu The Main Squeeze ® is Mt. Pleasant’s trusted source for quality fresh juices and smoothies. FAMILY ROOTS In the spring of 2013, Mt. Pleasant residents Anthony and Dana Collins were eager to start a new business venture. Dana had been a stay-at-home mom and had recently finished up a Biology degree at the College of Charleston, while Anthony worked in logistics. Their oldest daughter Erika was about to graduate from the College of Charleston and their sons Griffin and Ethan were starting their freshman year of college and high school respectively. Anthony, who had always been passionate about nutrition, found a listing for a locally-owned juice bar. He immediately knew that it would be the perfect way to invest back into the Mt. Pleasant community that they loved. With Erika and Dana helping lead the charge, Anthony’s family became the proud owners of The Main Squeeze ®. With a focus on improving health and fostering long-term relationships with customers, The Main Squeeze soon became a favorite around town. Griffin, Ethan, and many more enthusiastic employees soon joined the team and continue to help the business grow and promote healthy living. The Collins Family THE MAIN SQUEEZE DIFFERENCE Everything on our menu is made to order. Freshly pressed juice quickly unleashes vital nutrients to your body. Our Classic and Signature smoothies check all the marks when it comes to health benefits, taste, and caloric content. We always use whole fruits and vegetables, which retain fiber and help cleanse your digestive system. We use whole fruits and vegetables for every drink, without any added sugar, syrups, or other fillers. We are happy to work with you on your dietary needs and can customize your drinks in many ways. Enhance your smoothie with freshly juiced apples or oranges, add a plant-based protein powder, or reduce natural sugars by swapping out the juice in a smoothie with almond milk. Hungry for something to eat? We’ve got you covered there too with a full vegetarian menu of wraps, toasts, and açaí bowls that will keep you full for hours.Come in to taste and feel the difference at The Main Squeeze! Phone (843) 856-7399 Location Belle Hall Shopping Center656 Long Point Rd.Unit CMt. Pleasant, SC 29464 Hours Winter Hours (starting Nov. 2oth) 7:00am-5:00pm 9:00am-5:00pm Mon-Fri Sat-Sun CLASSIC SMOOTHIES 12oz $4.99 // 20oz $6.99 // 32oz $9.99 BERRY BREEZE Apple juice, strawberry, banana, mango, honey GEORGIA ON MY MIND Apple juice, strawberry, blueberry, banana, peach PBJ Apple juice, strawberry, banana, peanut butter TROPICAL SUPERFOOD Apple juice, pineapple, banana, mango, spinach SUNSET PARADISE Orange juice, pineapple, dragonfruit, mango, peach CHERRYLICIOUS Orange juice, cherry, kiwi, banana, blueberry SIGNATURE SMOOTHIES 12oz $6.99 // 20oz $8.99 // 32oz $12.99 ARNOLD SCHWARZEVEGAN Almond milk, strawberry, cherry, banana, peanut butter, chocolate protein LEAN GREEN Almond milk, spinach, mango, peach, banana, vanilla protein COCOA LOCO Almond milk, coffee, banana, peanut butter, chocolate protein, honey BANANA BABY Almond milk, banana, cinnamon, flax, almond butter, honey, oats THE PERFECT TEN Apple, celery, lemon, lime, parsley, ginger, spinach, strawberry, pineapple, blueberry GARDEN BLAST Carrot, apple, beet, ginger, spinach, kale, banana, pineapple JUICE BLENDS 12oz $7.99 // 20oz $9.99 // 32oz $13.99 LUNCH CLEANSE Cucumber, green apple, celery, spinach, kale, parsley, ginger, lime SUPERGREEN Spinach, lemon, pineapple, celery, green apple THE CURE Cucumber, orange, apple, spinach, mint PINK ENERGY Celery, beet, ginger, lime, lemon, green apple, spinach, parsley SWEET BEET Carrot, beet, orange, red apple, turmeric POWER BOOST Carrot, celery, ginger, beet, lemon, kale, parsley ONE-DAY JUICE CLEANSE $32.99 Four Specially Crafted Juices in 16oz bottles Choose from: Lunch Cleanse, Supergreen, The Cure, Pink Energy, Sweet Beet, and Power Boost SHOTS $3.99 for 2oz shot ANTI-INFLAMMATORY Turmeric Tonic (Orange, turmeric, black pepper) WELLNESS Wheatgrass (Organic wheatgrass) ENERGY Vitality Shot (Beet, spinach) IMMUNITY Flu Shot (Lemon, ginger, cayenne) BOWLS $10.99 WARRIOR BOWL Base of açaí, strawberry, and banana. Topped with granola, honey, cacao, strawberry, banana, almond butter PURA VIDA BOWL Base of coconut water, mango, dragonfruit, banana. Topped with granola, honey, pineapple, banana, kiwi, goji, coconut VERY BERRY BOWL Base of açaí, banana, strawberry. Topped with granola, honey, strawberry, blueberry, raspberry, hemp seeds, hazelnut spread DRAGON BOWL Base of coconut water, mango, dragonfruit, banana. Topped with granola, honey, mango, strawberry, kiwi, chia TOASTS $4.99 AVOCADO TOAST Whole grain bread, avocado, salt, pepper, oil, cayenne (add sprouts or cucumber +1.00,) MEDITERRANEAN TOAST Whole grain bread, house-made hummus, salt, pepper, mint, lemon (add sprouts or cucumber +1.00) PB TOAST Whole grain bread, peanut butter, banana, cinnamon, honey, chia (add strawberry or apple +1.00) Daily and Seasonal Specials also available! FOLLOW US ON SOCIAL MEDIA FOR UPDATES AND PROMOTIONS
